BACKGROUND

Access Source Code

ABSTRACT

PURPOSE

The purpose of this project was the development of an application that takes input from many biometric sensors and visualizes such data. This project will aid in the research of how particle matter density in the air affects the human body and its functions. Through the use of this application and a particulate matter density map/reading, research can be conducted on how human functions are impacted by the PM density

IMPLEMENTATION

The application was divided into into three modules: the EEG module, the repiration module and the temperature module. Within the EEG module, the application was to contain an EEG node visualization widget and an EEG graph. Within the respiration module the application was to have a heart rate widget and an ECG visualization widget as well as a Photoplethysmogram Graph Visualisation widget and an oxygen saturation\ widget. The temperature module was built with a thermometer in mind and a body temperature graph for the temperature sub-module along with a widget made for the visualization of Galvanic Skin Response and an accelerometer measuring the acceleration and vibration of the human body.

RESOURCES USED

The programming language of choice was Python. We also used toolkits such as PyQT5 and libraries like PyqtGraph to built the application according to requirements and standards aiming at the success and best implementation of the application
